connections.onlyConnect: Only connect with sites you trust.

home.youHaveNoTokens: You have no tokens or NFTs.

import.importModalSeed: The seed phrase must be 12, 15, 18, 21 or 24 words and you inserted {{seedLength}}.
import.importingYourAccount: After importing your wallet you must add again your hardware wallets and adjust the wallet's personal settings.

seedConfirm.seedError: The seed passed is wrong. Verify it and try again.
seedConfirm.youShould: You should now have your recovery phrase and your wallet password written down for future reference.

send.rbfOption: Disable this option for Replace-by-fee (RBF). When enabled, allows transaction replacement with higher {{currency}} fees.
send.zdagOption: Disable this option for Replace-by-fee (RBF) and enable for Z-DAG, a exclusive {{currency}} feature. Z-DAG enables faster transactions but should not be used for high amounts.
send.gasLimitTooLow: Gas limit must be greater than 42000
send.priorityFeeTooHigh: Priority fee must be less than max fee
send.priorityFeeMustBePositive: Priority fee must be 0 or greater
send.maxFeeTooLow: Max fee must be greater than priority fee
send.maxFeeMustBePositive: Max fee must be greater than 0
send.gasPriceTooLow: Gas price must be greater than 0
send.byGrantingPermission: By granting permission, you are authorizing the following contract to access your funds
send.grantCompleteControl: Grant complete control over ALL your
send.warningCollectionControl: Warning: This gives complete control over your entire collection!
send.thereIsAFee: There is a fee associated with this request.
send.canAccess: can access and spend up to this maximum amount.
send.reduceFee: Please, reduce fees to send transaction.
send.cantCompleteTxs: Can't complete transaction. Try again later.
send.feeError: Error in the proccess to get fee values, please verify your balance and try again later.
send.txSuccessfullMessage: Your transaction has been successfully submitted. You can see more details under activity on your home page.
send.toWithdraw: to withdraw and spend up to the following amount
send.transactionCreationFailed: Failed to create transaction: {{error}}. Please try again.
send.feeRateInsane: Fee rate {{value}} {{currency}}/byte is extremely high and will likely be rejected by the network.
send.feeRateExtreme: Fee rate {{value}} {{currency}}/byte is too high and may be rejected as non-standard.
send.feeRateHigh: Fee rate {{value}} {{currency}}/byte is very high. Please verify this is correct.
send.feeRateNormal: Fee rate {{value}} {{currency}}/byte is higher than normal.
send.insufficientFundsForGas: Insufficient funds to cover gas fees
send.maxUnavailablePendingTx: MAX is unavailable while you have a pending transaction. Please wait for it to confirm.
send.selectTokenIdOrTryDifferent: Select this token ID or try a different one
send.enterNftTokenId: Enter your NFT token ID (contract may not support enumeration)
send.orEnterDifferentTokenId: Or enter a different token ID
send.deleteCollectionConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This will remove all NFTs in this collection.
send.youOnlyOwn: You only own {amount} of this token
send.amountMustBePositiveInteger: Amount must be a positive integer
send.clickTokenOrEnterManually: Click a token above or enter ID manually
send.apiKeyTooltip: Include your API key in the URL if needed (e.g., https://api.etherscan.io/api?apikey=YOUR_KEY). This enables enhanced transaction details and history.
send.contractEstimateError: We were not able to estimate gas. There might be an error in the contract and this transaction may fail.
send.rpcEstimateError: The current RPC provider couldn't estimate the gas for this transaction. Therefore, we'll estimate the gas using the existing block data for your transaction.
send.atomicNotSupportedDescription: Pali wallet doesn't support atomic batch execution yet. Transactions will be sent individually.
send.noCallsProvidedDescription: The application did not provide any calls to execute. This might be an issue with the requesting application.
send.contractDataToNonContract: You're sending call data to an address that isn't a contract. This could cause you to lose funds. Make sure you're using the correct address and network before continuing.
send.enoughFunds: You don't have enough funds for this transactions.
send.txWillFail: The transaction will fail, fix it and try again!
send.decodificationNotAvailable: The decodification for this transaction is not available
send.insufficientFundsDetails: Insufficient funds. You need {{shortfall}} more {{currency}} to complete this transaction.
send.subtractFeeFailedDetails: Unable to send max amount. Transaction fee is {{fee}} {{currency}}, but only {{remainingFee}} {{currency}} is available after subtracting the amount.
send.invalidFeeRate: Invalid fee rate. Please enter a valid fee rate.
send.invalidAmount: Invalid amount. Please enter a valid amount.
send.invalidTokenId: Invalid token ID. Please enter a valid token ID.
send.invalidAssetAllocation: Invalid asset allocation. Token GUID {{guid}} not found or invalid.
send.networkBusy: Network is temporarily busy. Click to retry.
send.unableToCalculateFees: Unable to calculate fees. Click to retry.
send.ethSignRequires32Bytes: Expected message to be an Uint8Array with length 32. eth_sign requires a 32-byte hash, not arbitrary text. Please try personal_sign for arbitrary text.
send.signingMessage: You are signing a message with your private key.
send.signingPersonalMessage: You are signing a personal message.
send.dangerousSignatureWarning: This signature could grant complete control of your account to {{host}}. Only sign if you fully trust this site.
send.messageSigningNotAvailable: Message signing is not available on UTXO networks
send.ethSigningNotAvailable: ETH signing is not available on UTXO networks
send.signingForWrongAddress: This site is asking you to sign in using the wrong account.
send.suspiciousSignInRequest: The site making the request is not the site you're signing into. This could be an attempt to steal your login credentials.
send.invalidEthSignFormat: Invalid eth_sign message format. Expected 32-byte hex string (64 characters), got: "{{message}}". For signing arbitrary text, the dapp should use personal_sign instead.
send.verifyEnsOrUseAddress: Please verify the recipient ENS or use a 0x address.

settings.refreshButtonWarning: Enabling the refresh button will create additional network requests to update your wallet data. This may impact performance and could hit rate limits on public RPC providers. Consider using paid RPC services for better reliability.
settings.hereYouCanEnable: Here, you can enable advanced settings in Pali. Use them responsibly and at your own risk.
settings.yourWalletWasConfigured: Your wallet was configured successfully. You can change it at any time.
settings.isConnected: These are trusted sites you can connect to and share your public account information with.

settings.fixValidationErrors: Please fix the validation errors before saving

settings.importAccountsWont: Imported accounts won't link to your initial Pali account Secret Recovery Phrase.

settings.evmKeyOnUtxoError: This appears to be an EVM private key. Please switch to an EVM network to import it.
settings.youCannotRemoveActiveNetwork: You cannot remove the active network
settings.thisIsYourAccountIndexer: This is your account root indexer to check your full balance for
settings.itIsntAReceivingAddress: it isn't a receiving address. DO NOT SEND FUNDS TO THESE ADDRESSES, YOU WILL LOSE THEM!
settings.missingApiKey: Missing/Invalid API Key - Please add your API key to the URL (e.g., ?apikey=YOUR_KEY)
settings.apiFormatError: API does not respond correctly. Please check the URL and ensure it supports Etherscan/Blockscout API format.
settings.apiConnectionError: Unable to validate API. Please check your connection and try again.
settings.thisWillSwitch: This will switch the selected network within Pali to a previously added network
settings.thisActionErases: This action erases your current wallet.
settings.toRestoreThis: To restore this current wallet in the future ensure you have the recovery phrase.
settings.allYourSettings: All settings on this device (custom tokens and imported accounts) will be removed. This does not move or delete on-chain funds, but the encrypted private keys for imported accounts will be erased from this device. If you do not have the Secret Recovery Phrase or those private keys, you may permanently lose access to those assets.
settings.removeAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove the {{accountType}} account "{{accountName}}"? You can always recreate the account later if needed.
settings.hardwareWalletInstructions: Close this window and reopen Pali to use your hardware wallet for transactions. Your account is now saved and persistent.
settings.optimalExperience: For optimal hardware wallet experience, please use a larger screen or expand your browser window.
settings.networkNotFoundForEditing: Network not found for editing. Please refresh and try again.
settings.networkAlreadyExists: Network with Chain ID {{chainId}} already exists. Please use a different Chain ID or edit the existing network.
settings.utxoNetworkConflict: A {{networkType}} network already exists ({{existingNetworkName}}). Only one {{networkType}} network can be active at a time. Please remove the existing {{networkType}} network first.
settings.confirmRemoveNetwork: Are you sure you want to remove the network "{{networkName}}"?
settings.closeAndReopenPali: Close this window and reopen Pali to authenticate and connect your hardware wallet

start.paliDoesnt: Pali doesn't store your password. Regaining access requires a wallet reset with your Secret Recovery Phrase. This action erases the current wallet, created accounts, custom tokens, and imported accounts from your device, generating a new account tied to the reset phrase.
start.ifYouPlan: If you plan to import a new Secret Recovery Phrase, ensure you've noted the current one to avoid losing associated funds. Remember, custom tokens and imported accounts will need to be re-added after the reset. This process is irreversible, so proceed with caution.

blacklist.blacklistDefaultWarning: This address has been flagged as potentially malicious.
blacklist.blacklistWarningDiscouraged: Sending to this address is strongly discouraged and may result in loss of funds.
blacklist.permitSpenderWarning: This permit would allow a blacklisted address to spend your tokens. The spender address has been flagged as malicious.
blacklist.typedDataAddressWarning: The {{field}} address in this message has been flagged as malicious.
blacklist.makerWarning: The maker address creating this NFT trade order is blacklisted. This could be a malicious order attempting to steal your assets.
blacklist.takerWarning: The taker address specified in this order is blacklisted. This order may be designed to steal assets.
blacklist.offererWarning: The offerer address creating this Seaport order is blacklisted. This order may be attempting to steal your NFTs or tokens.
blacklist.zoneWarning: The zone validation contract is blacklisted. This could allow malicious code execution during the trade.
blacklist.feeRecipientWarning: A fee recipient address is blacklisted. Funds may be stolen through excessive or hidden fees.
blacklist.considerationRecipientWarning: A consideration recipient is blacklisted. Your assets may be sent to a malicious address.

spamWarning.title: We've noticed multiple requests
spamWarning.description: If you're being spammed with multiple requests, you can temporarily block the site.
